website_summaries.verdict: Designed for those with dementia and Alzheimer's but suitable for all, this nostalgic 36-piece puzzle is a winner.
pros: Pieces are extra-thick and easy for elderly hands to grasp
Easy-to-accomplish puzzle creates a satisfying old-time picture of soda counter, jukebox, and popcorn machine
Bright colors and satisfying interlocking pieces
cons: Some will find this puzzle to be too easy
Potential buyers should note that the word "Alzheimer's" is printed on the box, which may make some recipients uncomfortable

customer_reviews.title: “Altzheimers” written on the back of the box.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product but I wish it did not say “Altzheimers” all over the back of the box. The person I’m getting it does not need to be reminded of this and looking at the box will be upsetting. I am going to black out or tape something over the back of the box to accommodate this as I do think he’ll enjoy the product.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Cameron

customer_reviews.title: This puzzle is well made with sturdy board that lays very flat
customer_reviews.text: This puzzle is well made with sturdy board that lays very flat. The design, though it may be stimulating for the brain, proved to be very intimidating for my mom, a stroke survivor. The contrasting colors and repeating designs, the very thing that I thought would be helpful for her, kept her from being able to work this puzzle. It would probably be excellent for someone not overwhelmed by the 'business' of the design.
customer_reviews.author: mommahen

customer_reviews.title: nice puzzle
customer_reviews.text: The puzzle pieces are very big, maybe too big. I had to do it with her because she could not understand how to organize the edge pieces and how to look for pieces that had the right color on them for an adjoining piece. But that's her. Maybe something other than the Beatles for photos. Music from 40's/50's would have been better. Overall, it is a good puzzle. I have found that the horizontal puzzles are easier than ones that are vertical. She can see the horizontal puzzles better and she has difficulty reaching to the top of this vertical puzzle since the pieces are so big.
customer_reviews.author: Busy Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great activity to provide a positive experience
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! My father in law has dementia and we just relocated him into an assisted living facility. These first weeks have been very difficult for him. This puzzle gave us an activity to do on a visit with him that provided a distraction and calm for a time. It allowed him to focus on something other than his confusion over his new living arrangements. And provided a positive experience in his new place during our visit. Perfect size and great bold colors. I would recommend guiding your love one through the puzzle.
customer_reviews.author: O.K

customer_reviews.title: Mom loves it!!
customer_reviews.text: My mom has mild cognitive impairment she loved that she was able to complete the puzzle with a little help. The pieces are large enough for someone who might have arthritis. One of the pieces had a little lifting on one of the edges but other than that it's a good product. In the box they include a Free Gift card to claim a prize which are a choice of 1 out of 4 stickers, or a key-chain. When inputting my mom's info, I was disappointed that the year of birth only goes up to 1939. My mom was born in 1933. Thank God she still with us.
customer_reviews.author: AC-CALIF

product_meta.title: Springbok 36 Piece Jigsaw Puzzle The Malt Shop
product_meta.description:
Revisit the past with The Malt Shop! This 36 piece reissue of the popular 500 piece puzzle is perfect for those with age related memory impairments such as Alzheimer's Disease. With extra large pieces and a nostalgic theme designed for adults, this puzzle will bring success and joy as an activity patients, caregivers and family members of all ages can work on. 
Exercise Memory - Jigsaw Puzzles sharpen cognitive function. Current neurology experts assert that puzzles stimulate neuroplasticity and can even slow progressive memory loss.
Deepen Connections - Conversation flows naturally as your sort and interlock the design. It's like we always say: Love completes the puzzle.
Relieve Stress - Escaping into the calm of puzzling for as little as 20 minutes can sooth anxieties. It's the perfect digital detox for you and your loved ones.
feature_bullets: 36 PIECE JIGSAW PUZZLE - Featuring a finished size of 23.5 inches by 18 inches with a precision cut that ensures a tight, interlocking heirloom-quality puzzle
UNIQUE CUT, EXTRA LARGE PIECES - Each puzzle piece is unique and never repeated; Springbok Puzzle pieces are made from thick cut 75 point board, 18% thicker than the industry average
ECO-FRIENDLY & HIGH QUALITY - Springbok Puzzles are manufactured with sustainably sourced organic, non-toxic soy-based inks & utilizes 100% recycled puzzle board materials
MADE IN USA - Manufactured in Kansas City, Missouri; Springbok Puzzles have been American made since 1963
PERFECT FOR ALZHEIMER AND DEMENTIA - Springbok's Puzzle to Remember line is designed for those with age related memory impairments, with extra large pieces and nostalgic themes designed for adults
